description: Miteco, Artemide, Archestrato, and La Nostra Storia are the names of the menus at this restaurant, all of which showcase the ambitious Sicilian cuisine created by chef Guarneri, a lover of beauty and fine wine. The dining room is traditional in style, with tufa walls dating from the 15C, period wood furnishings and wrought-iron chandeliers. The delicious cuisine is expertly prepared, while the service is attentive and professional.
